document.full_text: former world number one maria sharapova was her usual belligerent self as she booked a place in the french open quarter-finals with a 7-6 7-5 win over polish 12th seed agnieszka radwanska on monday.
document.title: open-never-say-die sharapova advances into last eight
lines_and_colors: former world number one maria sharapova was her usual belligerent self as she booked a place in the french open quarter-finals with a 7-6 7-5 win over polish 12th seed agnieszka radwanska on monday.
